item.title: NEED help with webclient
item.dc:creator: @qoodscape qoodscape
item.description:
@qoodscape wrote:

well a good website hoster is webs.com or ucoz.com

when you jarred it upload it to your file manager.
now upload the client.html folder (that you made in notepad)
if you cant get it to work open up notepad (should be in accesaries)
and put the code he gave you in and then save it as

client.html

then get the link to the client.html file most of the time it would be something like…

Sitename.Sitehoster.com/client.html

or something if you use ucoz theres a link option you can press to find out the link to it.

then post the link on homepage so poeple know where to go.
(or go into the design config and you can put the html there)

and it should work if you need help just pm me. ill pm a guide with pictures

oh and make sure the jar file is in there too!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 07:40:52 pm[/size][hr][quote=“m4ul tw1nz, post:2, topic:210901”]Mmm Not wrong section 0.0

MM go look to rics tutorial
he made a vid over it : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9obXgxm_9qY&fmt=18

Good Luck with it![/quote]

he knows how to jar it… (since he said he already did lol)
he wants to know how to upload it…
